content: Once again in The Botanist in Brighton. One of my favourite occasional haunts. I’m in a new pair of heeled shoes and my feet are killing me, so I guess it’s time to read a book.

photo.alt: A latte in a fancy black textured ceramic cup with no handle. My hand is touching the cup and blue varnish is on my long thumb nail. Behind my hand are row plants sharing the bar, and behind the bar is a window to the road.
